title: Console output is confusing on fialing test

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: A fault in an existing feature

body:
When I run the console for tests the error I get is:

```
Starting:    VQPortal.Tests
   VQPortal.Tests.ErrorStatusCodeHandlerTests.Should_Return_Full_Stack_Trace_If_Setting_True [FAIL]
System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException: Exception has been thrown by the target of an invocation. ---> System.IndexOutOfRangeException: Array index is out of range.

Server stack trace: 
  at Xunit.ExceptionUtility.GetMessage (IFailureInformation failureInfo, Int32 index, Int32 level) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at Xunit.ExceptionUtility.GetMessage (IFailureInformation failureInfo, Int32 index, Int32 level) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at Xunit.ExceptionUtility.CombineMessages (IFailureInformation failureInfo) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at Xunit.ConsoleClient.StandardOutputVisitor.Visit (ITestFailed testFailed) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at Xunit.TestMessageVisitor.DoVisit[ITestFailed] (IMessageSinkMessage message, System.Func`2 callback) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at Xunit.TestMessageVisitor.OnMessage (IMessageSinkMessage message) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at Xunit.TestMessageVisitor`1[Xunit.Abstractions.ITestAssemblyFinished].OnMessage (IMessageSinkMessage message) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at Xunit.XmlTestExecutionVisitor.OnMessage (IMessageSinkMessage message) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at Xunit.TestClassCallbackHandler.OnTest (System.Xml.XmlNode xml) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at Xunit.TestClassCallbackHandler.OnXmlNode (System.Xml.XmlNode xml) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at Xunit.XmlNodeCallbackHandler.System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler.RaiseCallbackEvent (System.String eventArgument) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at (wrapper managed-to-native) System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices:InternalExecute (System.Reflection.MethodBase,object,object[],object[]&)
  at System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices.InternalExecuteMessage (System.MarshalByRefObject target, IMethodCallMessage reqMsg) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 

Exception rethrown at [0]: 

  at System.Runtime.Remoting.Proxies.RealProxy.PrivateInvoke (System.Runtime.Remoting.Proxies.RealProxy rp, IMessage msg, System.Exception& exc, System.Object[]& out_args) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  --- End of inner exception stack trace ---
  at System.Reflection.MonoMethod.Invoke (System.Object obj, BindingFlags invokeAttr, System.Reflection.Binder binder, System.Object[] parameters, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Reflection.MethodBase.Invoke (System.Object obj, System.Object[] parameters) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at Xunit.Sdk.ExecutorCallback+CallbackEventHandlerCallback.Notify (System.String value) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at Xunit.Sdk.Executor.OnTestResult (ITestResult result, Xunit.Sdk.ExecutorCallback callback) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at Xunit.Sdk.Executor+RunTests+<>c__DisplayClass12.<.ctor>b__11 (ITestResult result) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at Xunit.Sdk.TestClassCommandRunner.Execute (ITestClassCommand testClassCommand, System.Collections.Generic.List`1 methods, System.Predicate`1 startCallback, System.Predicate`1 resultCallback) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at Xunit.Sdk.Executor+RunTests+<>c__DisplayClass12.<.ctor>b__f () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at Xunit.Sdk.Executor.ThreadRunner (System.Object threadStart) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Threading.Thread.StartInternal () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
```

If I run the same test in Xamarin with the xUnit plugin I get the below:

```
Something went wrong when trying to satisfy one of the dependencies during composition, make sure that you've registered all new dependencies in the container and inspect the innerexception for more details.
---- Nancy.TinyIoc.TinyIoCResolutionException : Unable to resolve type: Nancy.NancyEngine
-------- Nancy.TinyIoc.TinyIoCResolutionException : Unable to resolve type: Nancy.Routing.DefaultRequestDispatcher
------------ Nancy.TinyIoc.TinyIoCResolutionException : Unable to resolve type: Nancy.Routing.DefaultRouteResolver
---------------- Nancy.TinyIoc.TinyIoCResolutionException : Unable to resolve type: Nancy.Routing.RouteCache
-------------------- Nancy.TinyIoc.TinyIoCResolutionException : Unable to resolve type: VQPortal.Modules.Api.SystemModule
------------------------ Nancy.TinyIoc.TinyIoCResolutionException : Unable to resolve type: VQPortal.Services.ISystemStatsService
```

Not sure what @x2bool is doing to get the proper error message...
